channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1668; 10:56PM; 4126 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CErOTk; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters contained the bulk of the fire to the 2nd floor (converted attic) of the craftsman home (possibly vacant). Crews defended the exposed apartment building from fire extension. There is some minor damage to window coverings. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. A total of over 80 firefighters were assigned to the incident however, knockdown was achieved (23 minutes) prior to arrival of all added resources. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E233 E266 E27 E33 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA46 RA803 RA815 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1668; 10:33PM; 4126 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CErOTk; Vermont Square; One story craftsman style home, well involved in fire. There is at least one structure (3 story apartment building) exposed. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E203 E210 E215 E221 E266 E27 E33 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA815 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Chemical Spill; INC#1488; 09:02PM; 1111 S Earle St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NHs5es; San Pedro; A total of 15 patients were affected by the fumes of a ship off loading fuel. Only one patient is being transported (age/gender unknown) in fair condition. All others declined LAFD transport. There is no evidence of any spills in the water or on the ground. LAFD resources will be conducting a final test of the atmosphere surrounding the area impacted and then clearing the scene. No further details.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 E238 E248 E36 E40 E48 RA112 RA36 RA848 RA864 RA865 SQ48 T38 T48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Chemical Spill; INC#1488; 08:08PM; 1111 S Earle St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NHs5es; San Pedro; The vapors from a ship offloading fuel affected workers on two adjacent ships, causing them to feel unwell. The number of workers affected, their conditions and whether they will require LAFD transport is being determined at this time. LAFD firefighters and HazMat Squad are investigating to determine if any hazard exists and what actions are required to mitigate it.; FS 40; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E248 E40 E48 RA112 RA36 RA848 SQ48 T48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

FULLY CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1207; 05:14PM; 3315 E Two Tree Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pgjh66; Lincoln Heights; FULLY CONTAINED: The first arriving fire companies quickly deployed and conducted a coordinated attack, anchoring and flanking the fire in just 12 minutes. Their actions contained the fire to less than 1 acre. There are no structures damaged and no injuries reported. All additionally requested resources and Air Operations are canceled. The companies on scene will continue with mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E212 E250 E3 E44 E47 E90 EM1 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 RA2 RA801 T1 T12 T2 T3 T50; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1207; 05:02PM; 3315 E Two Tree Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pgjh66; Lincoln Heights; Approximately 1/4 acre of light, flashy grass fire exposing one structure. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources requested.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E16 E201 E202 E44 E47 E90 EM1 H0A H0E RA2 RA801 T1 T2; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#0012; 01:19AM; 11308 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NfQqGZ; Broadway-Manchester; FIRE NOW OUT: At 12:17AM, LAFD responded to a reported structure fire and found a one story (60' x 80') metal clad, commercial building with two autos in a carport to the rear, well involved in fire. Firefighters initiated a defensive operation and extinguished the fire in 38 minutes (83 firefighters on scene KD at 12:55AM). While conducting the primary search, they located an adult male inside the building who was sadly beyond medical help. Firefighter/Paramedics determined him deceased on scene. LAPD and LAFD Arson Section are responding for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. LA County Coroner will determine identity and cause of death. The building appeared to be filled with mattresses but it is unclear exactly what type of business was in operation. No further details at this time.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E205 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 E66 EM13 HR3 RA264 RA5 RA64 RA864 T15 T21 T33 T5 T64 T66 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1519; 08:25PM; 11100 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XfpmfC; Broadway-Manchester; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the building of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E46 E57 RA65 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1519; 08:10PM; 11100 S Olive St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XfpmfC; Broadway-Manchester; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E46 E57 RA65 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#1482; 08:09PM; 9526 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43Qc2AS; Broadway-Manchester; A total of three patients were transported (others declined LAFD transport): 17yo female in critical condition, 7 yo male in critical condition, 31yo female with non-life threatening injuries. Any further media inquiries are referred to LAFD Inc# 4301; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA246 RA257 RA266 RA66 RA864 RA865 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
